segments.text: It's a beautiful day ! Let's play on those rides in the park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like a good idea . I love to play on the jungle gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . I love to play on the swing as well . Swing is my favorite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . Then we won't fight over taking the same ride .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the flowers over there . What are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are morning glories . They are cute , aren't they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are . We can find many different kinds of flowers and insects in the park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Last time I saw dandelions and ladybugs near the pond .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you come to the park in the morning , you can find squirrels running on the lawn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really healthy to do some exercise there . The air is fresher and it's romantic to watch the sunset with your lover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , off we go . I am sure we can have a great time .
segments.speaker: S1
